1.4. references Class

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block references[; parameters]
  table of objects
  !endblock

The object attributes are:

Field Category Rule
Reference mandatory  
Document optional  
Jump optional  
Version optional  
Status optional  

See Understanding Class Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The references filter is used to declare a set of references and matching documents. It can also be used to build a table of references within a document.

The attributes supported are:

Attribute Description
Reference the document code
Document the document name
Version the document version
Status the document status
Jump the URL, if any

Examples

See the sdf.sdm and document.reg files within SDF's sdf directory.
